channel.title: Astronomical event of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomical event of the day.

item.title: List of solar eclipses visible from the United States
item.description: This is a list of solar eclipses visible from the United States between 3000 and 2100. All eclipses whose path of totality or annularity passes through the land territory of the current fifty U.S. states and the District of Columbia are included. All types of solar eclipses, whether recent, upcoming, or in the past, are also included. For lists of eclipses worldwide, see the list of 20th-century solar eclipses and 21st-century solar eclipses.
